params.name: startDateTime
params.label: Start of the data retrieval range - Timestamp in ISO 8601

params.name: endDateTime
params.label: End of the data retrieval range - Timestamp in ISO 8601

params.name: TMV1Query
params.label: Filter for retrieving a subset of the collected endpoint activity data.
params.description: Example: dpt:443 or src:'192.169.1.1'. Check https://automation.trendmicro.com/xdr/api-v3#tag/Search/paths/~1v3.0~1search~1endpointActivities/get for filter syntax.
